featured.text: Henry: I asked you me return these books to the library.
This library is famous for its wide of books.
If you want to borrow magazines, tapes, or CDs, you can visit the library.
Henry: Please help me return these books to the library, James.

definition.zh_def: 一個提供書籍、雜誌和其他資料供公眾或特定群體使用的地方。
definition.en_def: A place that provides books, magazines, and other materials for public or specific group use.
definition.example: I borrowed a novel from the library.
